constituent: guess, house, ritual, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, crotch, altar, show, two, small
heisigStory: "Guess" here has the sense of a measured conjecture. Its elements: house . . . ritual.
koohiiStory1: I have an informed guess about whose house the dark rituals are performet at.
koohiiStory2: It´s anyone´s guess who´s house she will wake up in the morning after the festival (祭-matsuri)　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　RTK2:　サツ　警察　けいさつ(police)…　Pure Group:　擦1104.
words: to guess, to sense, to presume, to judge, to sympathize with
